description.value: At 20th level, while a spiritualistâ€™s phantom is confined in her consciousness, she is immune to mind-affecting effects and spells and effects that involve possession, such as @Compendium[pf1.spells.8ai7fslz4zu8xe9s]{Magic Jar} and @Compendium[pf1.spells.4mw83czf7b62rar3]{Possession}.
